snippet.title: Evil Dead: The Game - Official Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the latest trailer for the upcoming co-op PvP and PvE multiplayer action game, Evil Dead: The Game.

In Evil Dead: The Game, work as a team of four survivors, including Ash, Kelly Maxwell, Pablo Simon Bolivar, Scotty, Lord Arthur, and more, to kick Deadite butt and banish the vile Kandarian Demon. Or become the mighty Demon yourself, using your powers of possession to stop the good guys dead and swallow their souls.

Evil Dead: The Game launches on May 13, 2022, for PC via Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. The game will also be released on Nintendo Switch at a later date.

#IGN #Gaming #EvilDeadTheGame
